channel.title: Help needed, i dont understand this code
channel.description:
Hello, sorry if you mistake me for a noob by the title :| But. i have tried using mehaku's tut for multi targetted Ancients i think i have found out whats causing it but i dont understand the code thats causing it since i am still learning in C++ well, here's the error in the runserver.bat when using the code [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:67) at client.magicOnNpc(client.java:26405) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19993) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13977) at client.process(client.java:13947) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)[/code]
and if you look at the attackNPCSWithin it has this in it [code]for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)[/code]
and the static int maxNPCs funnily enough is 10,000
[code]public static int maxNPCs = 10000;[/code]
i do not understand this, [code](int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)[/code] type of code, would anybody be kind enough to help me fixing this, has cheez as stated he CBA :| lol anyways, help would be useful. ;D

item.title: Help needed, i dont understand this code
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

That array is too big.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed, i dont understand this code
item.dc:creator: @AncientZzZ AncientZzZ
item.description:
@AncientZzZ wrote:

Hello,
sorry if you mistake me for a noob by the title
But.
i have tried using mehaku’s tut for multi targetted Ancients
i think i have found out whats causing it but i dont understand the code thats causing it since i am still learning in C++
well, here’s the error in the runserver.bat when using the code

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:67) at client.magicOnNpc(client.java:26405) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19993) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13977) at client.process(client.java:13947) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)

and if you look at the attackNPCSWithin it has this in it

for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)

and the static int maxNPCs funnily enough is 10,000

public static int maxNPCs = 10000;

i do not understand this,

(int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)

type of code, would anybody be kind enough to help me fixing this, has cheez as stated he CBA lol
anyways, help would be useful.
;D
